Subject: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::Magmatron::

    Still searching for the bots he noticed that Bobertron was returning, and 
he had a guest. Once he got inside he ran to the lab. Good, thought 
Magmatron, now we can begin making him Destron.
    He made his way down to the lab. Once he came in view he started to get 
ready.
    "Bobertron, who is your friend? No matter right now. Lay down on the 
table and we can begin." Magmatron oredered. He set the controls for 
automatic and brought the catbot to the other lab.
    "Computer scan room for alligence." Magmatron said. 
    "One Destron signal and one Maximal signal in room." The computer replied.
    "Maximal, hmmm...he could come in handy." Magmatron started to think. 
Then he turned his head and saw the screen with the Key to the Ark on it. 
"Yes, that should do nicely."
    He turned and went to a drawer, pressing a button it opened, inside were 
three cases with one chip in each. He picked one up. He then walked back over 
to the cat and opened a hatch in his head. Ever so carefully he placed the 
chip in the right place. He then closed the hatch on his head.
    Magmatron walked back over to the Computer station and started typing in 
codes. And questions. Finally he programmed the slight fear of Maximals and 
Predacons.
    As soon as that was done it was time for stage two. He went outside and 
transformed to beast mode, he then lifted off with Cheetor on his back. 
Landing just outside of the scanner range for the Maximal base he put Cheetor 
on the ground. He sent a signal so that the Maximals would know Cheetor was 
there. Then he returned to base.
